name: Atari Video Cube
summary: Atari Video Cube is a puzzle video game developed by GCC for the Atari 2600 and published by Atari, Inc. in 1982. Atari Video Cube was sold exclusively through the Atari Club, run by Atari, Inc. Originally an unlicensed interpretation of the Rubik's Cube toy, Atari re-released the game in 1984 as Rubik's Cube.
info:
• 发行: Atari
  • 平台: Atari 2600
  • 游戏类型: PUZ
  • 游玩人数: 1人
